casebody.data:
John M. Otter, Respondent v. The Metropoltan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1892. Appeal by defendants from a judgment, entered on the report of a referee, in favor of the plaintiff. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, attorneys, and Charles Gibson Bennett of counsel, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
